WelcomeMsg: Hi, you've reached a counsellor. What would you like to talk about?
GoodbyeMsg: We're glad you reached out to Kids Help Phone. Would you have 5 minutes to answer a few questions to help us improve the service? The survey is optional. We appreciate your help if you choose to participate! You can also find more information about data usage & the survey by clicking the link: https://survey.alchemer-ca.com/s3/50188874/Post-Chat-Survey
EndChatMsg: We noticed you ended your chat. Would you have 5 minutes to answer a few questions to help us improve the service? The survey is optional. We appreciate your help if you choose to participate! You can also find more information about data usage & the survey by clicking the link: https://survey.alchemer-ca.com/s3/50188874/Post-Chat-Survey
ClosedOutOfShift:
We're sorry, but Live Chat is currently closed. :( 
To reach a Kids Help Phone counsellor, call us anytime at 1-800-668-6868. 
Be well, 
The Kids Help Phone Team
